gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `DesignatedReserve` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `DesignatedReserve` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `DesignatedReserveMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DesignatedReserveMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_DesignatedReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_DesignatedReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfDesignatedReserveMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfDesignatedReserveMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfDesignatedReserveMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfDesignatedReserveMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
